IF(NOT WIN_32)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()


### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Libs/cef_binary_3.2704.1434.gec3e9ed_windows32.7z cef_binary_3.2704.1434.gec3e9ed_windows32)
DKSET(CEF ${3RDPARTY}/cef_binary_3.2704.1434.gec3e9ed_windows32)


### LINK ###
DKDEFINE(__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS)
DKDEFINE(__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS)
DKDEFINE(PSAPI_VERSION=1)
DKDEFINE(NOMINMAX)
DKDEFINE(CEF_SANDBOX)
DKDEFINE(CEF_ATL)

WIN32_INCLUDE(${CEF})
WIN32_DEBUG_LIB(${CEF}/Debug/libcef.lib)
WIN32_RELEASE_LIB(${CEF}/Release/libcef.lib)
WIN32_DEBUG_LIB(${CEF}/${OS}/libcef_dll/Debug/libcef_dll_wrapper.lib)
WIN32_RELEASE_LIB(${CEF}/${OS}/libcef_dll/Release/libcef_dll_wrapper.lib)
#WIN32_DEBUG_LIB(${CEF}/Debug/cef_sandbox.lib)
#WIN32_RELEASE_LIB(${CEF}/Release/cef_sandbox.lib)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${CEF}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} ${CEF})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(cef_binary_3.2704.1434.gec3e9ed_windows32 cef.sln libcef_dll_wrapper)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(cef_binary_3.2704.1434.gec3e9ed_windows32 cef.sln libcef_dll_wrapper)
